title: Real Recorded Car Sounds - Car Sounds - Truck Sounds - SUV Sounds
description: 352 Premium Car Sound Effects That Will Take Your Game To The Next Level!
longDescription:
-> Listen To The Preview <-

**Limited Time: Add $5 and get our Ultimate SFX Bundle (9000+ Sounds)**

**Music Not Included (Car sounds only)


In this pack you will find 352 Car, Truck, SUV, Muscle car and everything else you might need for your driving system! The sounds were carefully chosen out of 1000s of sounds we recorded. All sounds are game ready and were designed to bring your game to life!

 

The Pack Includes the following sounds:


Car Impacts Another Car – 5

Car Impact Concrete – 5

Car Engine Loop – 15

Car Engine Rev - 5

Muscle Car Engine Loop – 10

SUV Engine Loop – 10

Truck Engine Loop - 10

Car Engine Start – 10

Car Engine Stop – 10

Muscle Car Engine Start – 5

Muscle Car Engine Stop – 5

SUV Engine Start – 5

SUV Engine Stop – 5

Truck Engine Start – 5

Truck Engine Stop – 5

Car Brakes – 10

Car Brake Screech - 5

Car Flasher – 10

Car Alarm Loop – 5

Car Gear Shift – 10

Car Horn/Honk – 15

Car Refuel – 5

Car Remote (Open) – 5

Car Remote (Close) – 5

Inflate Car Tire – 5

Opening Door = 10

Closing Door – 10

Opening Trunk – 5

Closing Trunk – 5

Exhaust Pop – 5

Window rolling up – 10

Window rolling down – 10

Windshield Wipers Loop – 10

Car Screech – 5

Car pass by – 10 - *The sound you hear when a car passes you by on a Fastlane

Car Explosion – 10

Road Ambiance Loop 10 - *The sound you hear when inside a car 

Road Ambiance Loop Rain – 5

Road Ambiance Loop Hail – 2

Road Ambiance Loop Thunders - 3 

Car Lockpick – 5

Glovebox Open – 5

Glovebox Close – 5

Car Window Break – 5

Car Smoking – 5

Car On Fire Loop – 5 

Tire Pop – 5 *Sound of tire suddenly popping

Tire Losing Air – 5 



Hope you enjoy this pack and good luck with your game :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 352

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes - Seamlessly)
